criteria.name: User Interface
criteria.reason: The user interface is clean and easy to navigate.
criteria.proposal: Consider adding more customization options for better user experience.

criteria.name: Performance
criteria.reason: The loading times are slower than expected.
criteria.proposal: Optimize image sizes and implement lazy loading to improve performance.

criteria.name: Mobile Responsiveness
criteria.reason: The website is mobile-friendly and responsive across all devices.
criteria.proposal: Add advanced touch gestures for mobile users to enhance interaction.

criteria.name: Functionality
criteria.reason: Some features are not functioning as expected during testing.
criteria.proposal: Fix the bugs related to form validation and improve error handling.

criteria.name: Content Engagement
criteria.reason: The content is well-organized, but lacks engaging multimedia elements.
criteria.proposal: Incorporate more video and interactive content to increase engagement.

criteria.name: Security
criteria.reason: The security measures are robust, ensuring data protection.
criteria.proposal: Continue regular security audits and updates to maintain high standards.
